title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]UFC / MMA LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (NB)[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('(?s)league-name ml-2">([^<]*).*?title="Buffstreams([^"]*)"\s*href="([^"]*).*?score">\s*([^<]*)\n.', page_data) return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests t = requests.get('[makelist.param2]').text x = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*).*?platinum">([^<]*)',t) #z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) sort = [(client.tinyw(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in x if 'Platinum'in i[2] if 'p2pstreams' not in i[0] if 'sportinglive' not in i[0] if 'DAZN' not in i[1] if 'ripplestream4u' not in i[0] if 'espnonline' not in i[0] if 'papahd' not in i[0] if 'stakes100' not in i[0] if 'cr8soccer' not in i[0] if 'topstreamer' not in i[0]] #sort1 = [(client.tinyw(i[0] ,i[1]) for i in z ] return sort #+ sort1

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external('[lists.param1]') pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('btn-info.*title="([^"]*)".*href="([^"]*)"[\s\S]*?img.*?src.*?src="([^"]*)', page_data) return r

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = '[makelist.param2]'): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui whitehat = 'http://playoffsstream.com/' + url pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external(whitehat) pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]UFC / MMA LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (SRS)[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re page_data = client.request('https://v2.sportsurge.net/list-mma') page_data = page_data.split('>WATCH<',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('<footer class=',1)[0] s = re.findall('(?s)<a href="([^"]*).*?m;">([^<]*).*?;">([^<]*)',page_data) r = [('https://v2.sportsurge.net/'+i[0],i[1],i[2]) for i in s] return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re page_data = client.request('[makelist.param1]') r = re.findall('(?s)game-forecast-link MobildeGoster.*?ef=\'([^\']*).*?4>([^<]*)',page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1]) for i in r if 'Stream East' not in i[1] if 'dudestream' not in i[1] if 'chenstream' not in i[1] if 'NbaStreams' not in i[1] if 'Livefreegame' not in i[1] if 'tvsportslive' not in i[1] if 'bilasport' not in i[1] if 'Dubz Streams' not in i[1] if 'Freetvlive1' not in i[1] if 'NoDelayStream' not in i[1] if 'Sportinglivestreamz' not in i[1] if 'Icelz ' not in i[1] if 'bestnhl.com' not in i[1] if 'papahd' not in i[1] if 'Sports News' not in i[1] if 'sportsio' not in i[1] if 'Streamos' not in i[1] if 'SoccerJumboTV' not in i[1] if 'streamhd247' not in i[1] if 'babysharkstream' not in i[1] if 'Icelz' not in i[1] if 'MyGoodStream' not in i[1] if 'Semensport' not in i[1] if 'Bilasport' not in i[1] if 'Sports24' not in i[1] if 'Yoursports Stream' not in i[1] if 'KobeStreams' not in i[1] if 'sportsway' not in i[1] if 'summerstream' not in i[1] if 'RoyStream' not in i[1] if 'BuffStreams' not in i[1] if 'Time4tv' not in i[1]] return sort

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return import re page_data = page_data.split('>MMA Live Streams and Schedule<',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('>MMA Streams<',1)[0] s = re.findall('(?s)<a href="([^"]*).*?ing">([^<]*).*?>.*?>\s*([^<]*)\n+',page_data) return s

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,base64 x = re.findall('window.atob\(\'([^\']*)',page_data)[0] x = base64.b64decode(x).decode('utf-8') return x + '|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:107.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/107.0&Referer=https://methstreamer.com/'

title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]UFC / MMA LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (P2P)[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):# time adjust by streamwatcher2013 gtime=re.findall('class.+?\d\s*(\d+:\d+)',page_data) for t in gtime: localtime = int(t[:-3]) - 10 # Eastern Time Zone 'adjust time zone by changing 10 up or down - not perfect' if localtime > 24: localtime -= 24 if localtime < 1: localtime += 24 lctime = str(localtime)+t[2:] lctime = lctime.zfill(5) # insure the var time is 5 spaces by adding leading zero page_data=page_data.replace(t, lctime) return re.findall('class="takos"[\w\W]*?.*?href="([^"]+)[\w\W]*?.*?class.+?\d">([^<]+)[\w\W]*?.*?(\d+:\d+)',page_data)

regex: m5 file:\s*'([^']+) $doregex[m4]|Upgrade-Insecure-Requests=1 # m4 gets http://nbazones.com/embed/ch**.php http://p2pstreams.live/ $doregex[getCookie]

title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [COLOR white]UFC / MMA LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (S24)[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,base64 w = re.findall('<iframe id.*?src="([^"]*)', page_data)[0] w = w.replace('https:','') w = w.replace('//','https://') if w.startswith('/'): w = 'https://sports24.club' + w h = client.request(w) l = re.findall('atob\(["|\']([^"|\']*)', h)[0]; l = base64.b64decode(l).decode('utf-8') l = l.replace('https:','') l = l.replace('//','https://') if l.startswith('/'): l = 'https://sports24.club' + l return l + '|user-agent=iPad&referer=' + w

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return url = client.schedule('http://hdstreamss.club/') return url

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client url = client.external('[makelist.param3]') return url
